website_summaries.verdict: While it's a good investment for the price, results generally pale in comparison to more expensive units.
pros: This mini stepper is a hit among consumers looking for a compact machine that doesn't compromise performance
cons: Consistent squeaking noise prompts many users to increase the volume on their TV or electronic devices

customer_reviews.title: Compact and effective
customer_reviews.text: Compact, adjustable and easy to use. I am a petite woman, 60+, who purchased this specifically to tone my muscles needed to climb stairs. I set it up in my kitchen breakfast nook and do a set of 50 whenever I happen by, several times a day. It is very effective. I saw an improvement in the ease in climbing stairs very quickly, my endurance on my daily walks has improveed and I have also noticed my daily lower backaches have eased, an unexpected bonus. This machine would be more for someone more like me: older, impaired or less fit. It would not be challenging enough for a young, athletic person.
customer_reviews.author: SzB71

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Took a little while to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Took a little while to assemble. But once you get past the first part the rest falls in place. I don't use it as much as I should, but when I do I can feel a difference especially in the lower belly and thighs. The best thing is that it takes up very little room and easy to maneuver. Highly recommend if you have a hectic schedule and can't be precise with a workout schedule. A couple of days with this stepper and you can feel a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Barb L.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful mini stepper
customer_reviews.text: very easy to put together and operate, we really like it a lot!!! Nice that it doesn't take up a lot of space and it isn't heavy to move at all. So glad we purchased this item. Keep up the great work!!!! Ellen Hassinger
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Hassinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition for at home workouts
customer_reviews.text: Sooo Im totally in love with this stepper. It was super easy to put together and easy to use. I’m taking away one star because the little computer panel doesn’t work. Cuts on but doesn’t count anything. Oh I’m 5ft 4 in and comes to just below my breast for those are wanting to know if it’s super short. It’s not!
customer_reviews.author: kinyetta Staley

customer_reviews.title: Very decent machine
customer_reviews.text: So far, this seems like what I wanted! My husband easily assembled it and I like using it. It's not too hard, so I actually use it, and the tension can be turned up if/when I want it to be more difficult. I can easily lift it and move to another room when done. It does not fold up , but it has a small footprint and is movable. As other reviewers said, it did start squeaking by the 3rd day of use, so we'll put some WD40 on it. For the price, its exactly what I wanted: good for a basic cardiovascular exercise & to keep legs strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very solid and works nicely. Compact to fit anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine for my needs. One should know that, unlike the video that's on youtube, you don't need, nor should you let the pedals go all the way to the floor or where they touch the metal. you should peddle right in the center, keeping it from touching the bottom by at least two inches or more. I have my mini stepper in a small spare bedroom and have no problem getting aroud it. It is easy to move and fits pretty much anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: 48 days in it BROKE
customer_reviews.text: I saw the reviews and decided to give it a try. I am 195 my wife is 135 and we both used it 5 days a week for an average of 1500 steps per day. Then less than 6 week in, one of the limiting arms broke and I fell backwards onto the floor. UNSAFE and a unit like this should last years of average use, not a month! And since it is over 30 days I can no longer return it. And I don't want to fix it since I know it WILL happen again. LOOK ELSEWHERE this is not a quality product...
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Edward

customer_reviews.title: Health Advantage
customer_reviews.text: I love the stepper. It has giving me health advantages I did not expect. It has helped my lower back more any other treatment. I have torn rotator cuffs. complete tear in right shoulder and partial in left. It causes pain in my upper arms. I have been pushing on the stepper with arms just like you do with your feet. It has taken the pain out of my arms! I am small in stature so have no issues with sturdiness. Go gently with the arms. I do fifteen reps with my arms where I do many more with my legs. I am not saying this will work for those with my situation but it has worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Easy workout for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine for short workouts. I get on it 4 or 5 times a day for 5 - 10 minutes. The faster you step the harder the workout. It's great when I can't get out for a 2 or 3 mile walk because of the weather. I also bought one for my 80 year old mother. She'll get on it for a few minutes several times a day as she can't do long walks. It helps keep her leg strength up and keeps her from being completely inactive. I bought my mother's 3 years ago and I've had mine for over 2. I won't hesitate to buy another one if this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: I just try to block out the noise but it's not great. I would probably drive anyone around me nuts ...
customer_reviews.text: People are right when they say it squeaks. After about 30 minutes of exercise it will get hot and start to squeak. No matter what you lube it up with, the heat from the friction is too much for it. Sometimes it stops. I just try to block out the noise but it's not great. I would probably drive anyone around me nuts with it. But it's a compact machine and does what it's supposed to - work the glutes! And when I say the machine gets hot in the places where the hydraulic pumps are, you can burn your skin if you touch it. FYI.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pikaard

customer_reviews.title: is this thing sturdy and heavy
customer_reviews.text: wow !!! is this thing sturdy and heavy. well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: pdmkiss

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This stepper was really easy to put together. It's super small and I put it behind my couch so i can use it while I watch t.v. It was squeaking a bit, but it comes with grease for you to put on which stops the noise. This is a great product for the price and I have not had any big issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Happy Stepping
customer_reviews.text: Slight hitch in assembly, but figured it out and have been stepping away! Just needed muscle exercise for stair climbing and this does it. Sturdy, and especially like adjustable resistance feature. (Do 20 or so steps at a time, about 10 x a day, every time I pass the Wagan.) Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Torchwood

customer_reviews.title: If you want a good work out
customer_reviews.text: If you want a good work out,Not the right stepper.Its too low.It has a controller to ajust the height but it will not stay put.It would be perfect if it had a higher stepper and stay on the height you set it for.Great for someone in their eighties.
customer_reviews.author: C.P

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Easy to assemble and takes up very little ...
customer_reviews.text: Just put the Wagan together and tried it. Very pleased. Easy to assemble and takes up very little room. It is also nice that there is a video on YouTube that goes through the assembly process although it is very easy. The Wagan seems to be very well made and the cost is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: It has several different resistant settings so the stepper can 'grow' with you.
customer_reviews.text: I love my mini stepper. It is strengthening my knees and allowing me to get a little exercise when I couldn't before. My husband put it together in a flash. I was on it fifteen minutes after it was delivered. It was exactly as described online.
customer_reviews.author: M. Swagert

customer_reviews.title: High-pitched squeaky noise maker
customer_reviews.text: I like the Wagen Ministepper in that it has handles that fit my height (5'2"). However, I don't like the extremely high-pitched squeaking noise it makes after a short time even after putting provided grease in the hydraulic area. The noise drives me crazy -- I'm afraid to know the dB level. I don't know if all mini steppers at various prices make noise. I just know this one does and that I'm very sorry I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Donna G. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Small work-outs equal BIG difference!
customer_reviews.text: It is very good for a person who wants a little work-outs during the day. I do work-outs when watching news, when sitting idle, when looking out the window, when watching the neighbors, etc. So, 10 minutes here and there......makes a Big difference in a month!
customer_reviews.author: Tough Lady

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Not for someone who needs an intense workout. Super squeaky
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cochetas

customer_reviews.title: This is a good stepper for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a good stepper for the money. Easy to set up and lightweight. I had to make sure the stepper was placed on a level surface and have the wrench/screwdrive tool supplied nearby to tighten bolts. I set up the timer but cannot make it work properly, but that is not a big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: emklees

customer_reviews.title: Stepping Fun
customer_reviews.text: Very nice exerciser for a lightweight workout. The Wagan Company was excellent to work with. My 1st one had a broken step but they replaced it free and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gwozdziowski

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a very basic work out
customer_reviews.text: Nice for a very basic work out. Love the compact size. It makes a bit of a creaking noise even when greased. The range of movement and resistance is limited but overall the machine is a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy! Noisy! Noisy! Even new.
customer_reviews.text: Easy yi assemble. The pedals are smaller that ‘Sunny Health’ model which I sent back due the noise, this machine is worse. They say lubricant the hydraulic parts. Oh yeah which might that be under the exterior? Why didn’t you engineer it to work quietly, this is the 21th century?
customer_reviews.author: COOKIE

customer_reviews.title: This provides a good low-impact way to get weight-bearing exercise
customer_reviews.text: I finally found something I can tolerate! I have arthritis in my spine and osteoporosis. This provides a good low-impact way to get weight-bearing exercise! The directions weren't 100% clear, but I was able to assemble it myself.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our camper
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes it a lot in our camper. I might be a bit too heavy for it. The grease that comes with it is pretty useless against the squealing. We use a couple squirts of WD40 on the joints every few weeks. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mick in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Need to be under 200 lbs to use it.  It is well made.
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent for seniors to be able to use in the house and to work up to more steps. My husband even uses it. He's 89 and does 100 steps or more at a time. I only do 50 and feel fortunate I can do that many. It strengthens your leg muscles. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Pattsyd

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Grease to silence squeaks doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Grease to silence squeaks doesn't last long. Decided to return. Was unaware that I have to pay for freight and restock fees. Never have I seen or heard of restock fees.
customer_reviews.author: Maddalena Ferris

customer_reviews.title: My blind husband is using this product. It certainly ...
customer_reviews.text: My blind husband is using this product. It certainly is not intended for strong, muscle types that require a tough work out. However, for the older and/or sedentary (for whatever reason), it provides some simple exercise for the legs. The screws do have to be tighten occasionally. Overall, for that price and the way we are using it, it is worth it
customer_reviews.author: J. G.

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: A good buy. I am handicapped and this helps me. We live in a small space and it fits
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Screws don’t stay tight and squeak like crazy. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lisa petovello

customer_reviews.title: broken after first use
customer_reviews.text: I am sure that I would have loved this product... it is a great size for our small house. Unfortunately, my husband (who doesn't even weigh 200 lbs) decided to try it out for me... he took about 3 steps and we heard a loud crack!! The pedal cracked underneath and now it cannot be used, as the entire stepper is now rocking and unsteady. However, I called the manufacturer, who instantly stated that a replacement pedal will be shipped ASAP. They were quick, attentive and very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: michael sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the mechanical linkage even though it is noisier than my old cable linked machine
customer_reviews.author: madnjhn

customer_reviews.title: The stepper goes together very easily and is small enough to fit into any space
customer_reviews.text: The stepper goes together very easily and is small enough to fit into any space. Due to knee situations we find that even the least tight setting is bothering our knees. Hopefully, with use, we'll strengthen our knees or we'll have trouble using the equipment. But, if you don't have knee problems, it is a nice stepper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Compact
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and works well . Only complaint is a bit wobbly on carpet, but believe that is due to how small the base is. Base needs to be small though in order for this stepper to be compact as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Craftychick

customer_reviews.title: That product is worth purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact but handle bars too high for my mom to use
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY SIMON

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I was shocked with the weight of the metal pipes. This is made to last, which is in small supply these days. This is very nice, kudos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great exercise machine!
customer_reviews.text: this is just what I needed! perfect for me to exercise. my back cannot take bouncing, twisting & turning.
customer_reviews.author: AngelHugs4JC

customer_reviews.title: Consumer Evaluation
customer_reviews.text: This WAS intended as a gift. Product picture (instruction manual) DIFFERENT than actual product. THERE ARE NO HOLES AT BASE TO ATTACH STAND THOUGH THERE ARE BOLTS FOR SUCH. SEEMS UNSTABLE; SANS THE HOLES FOR BOLTS, UNIT NEEDS SOLDERING. Will return for refund. Due to lack of secured attachment between base and stand, can NOT confidentially recommend. Missing holes SEVERE error by manufacturer (Wagan). Safety first! (:>)
customer_reviews.author: Racene LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stepper works great. The counter doesn’t work that well but the stepper itself is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Solid stepper, great value
customer_reviews.text: Great Stepper, solid frame structure. Gives me a good work out, in a small space. I like that it has handle bars for better control and balance. Great value for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: sophie'rella

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise tool
customer_reviews.text: Great exercise tool. Fits any small space and you don't have to go anywhere to get your heart rate up and strengthen your legs.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Does not look out of place in my bedroom or living room
customer_reviews.text: I like how compact it is and Easy to use without feeling like I’m working out.
customer_reviews.author: Danell malewski

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about getting this and having a way to work out in my room, but it was really uncomfortable on my knees, mostly because of the tightness of the steps. If you loosen them, you don't really get any benefit, and it's still uncomfortable because of the design while it's compact.
customer_reviews.author: Belle-Cat

customer_reviews.title: tO GET EXERCISE AND STRENGTHEN MY LEGS.
customer_reviews.text: iT IS STURDY BUT NOT TOO HEAVY TO MOVE AROUND. WORKS FINE.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne lynn

customer_reviews.title: Decent For the Price
customer_reviews.text: Like the size, but start squeaking a lot. Greasing hasn't helped. I like the size of it, and that it's eady to move. You can get a good cardio workout it you use it for more than a few minutes and increase your speed.
customer_reviews.author: Lorriepoo

customer_reviews.title: the best thing in my life
customer_reviews.text: this is the best exercise machine a woman could ask for
customer_reviews.author: peggy pier

customer_reviews.title: Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Gets the job done and takes up very little space.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The steps are too short. Could be a bit more steppy
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love that the step height is adjustable... Can set it high for max workout. Recovering from knee and foot surgery and needed to build strength in my leg. Perfect! And doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great stepper
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I’m getting a good work out on it.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Good exercise
customer_reviews.text: It really gives you a work out it’s hard to push down but that’s what gives you the work out.
customer_reviews.author: Russell G.

customer_reviews.title: and you can get a good workout with it
customer_reviews.text: This stepper does all that I need it to. It is portable, doesn't take up much room, and you can get a good workout with it. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: BDK Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: I just wish i was able to control how big ...
customer_reviews.text: I just wish i was able to control how big of step I made but it gets the job done when you can't go out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love this. its convienient and doesnt take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times a day since I got it. I love it. I would recommend it to anyone. I actually put it together myself. How cool is that?
customer_reviews.author: crybaby2

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but very noisey🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!!!!! The only problem is it starts squeaking after a couple of uses and keeps getting louder with each use......I have WD 40ed it to death and it hasn’t helped!!! But I do love it❤️
customer_reviews.author: Margaret C

customer_reviews.title: Great for light leg workouts.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this stepper for light workouts. It does not squeak or wobble. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Useful little stepper
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, works well but would like it to step a little higher. Like the small compact size that will hide in a corner or closet when needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner women

customer_reviews.title: I love this stepper!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stepper! Easy to assemble, way heavier and sturdier than I expected and works smoothly. Great value for money and takes up so little space I can tuck it behind a post in my living room and watch TV while I step.
customer_reviews.author: S. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great workout.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lovs it. She uses it on her off days when she doesn't go to the gym. Great workout.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Barry

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Like that it did not take up much space. The monitor did not work on the 2nd day after receiving the product. I tried to change the battery and it still not work
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Great, but LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Great, compact machine but it squeaks incredibly loudly when you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little device - especially considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Assembly went well (and I have some-assembly-required-ophobia!) and it seems sturdy enough (so far).
customer_reviews.author: M. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: ... I've only had it for a few days I love it. I work up a good sweat using ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm moderately fit and although I've only had it for a few days I love it. I work up a good sweat using it.
customer_reviews.author: Latina

customer_reviews.title: This stepper is very compact and enjoyable when weather doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This stepper is very compact and enjoyable when weather doesn't permit walking outside. It's durable enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: AmyKatieGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very lovely little machine. I have placed it in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very lovely little machine. I have placed it in the shower for ease of use on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to move
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to move , but the steps break off easy when you exercise because of cheat plastic steps....
customer_reviews.author: David M. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy about this
customer_reviews.text: Well it did get here. The package really went through a rough time. Box was ripped. Wire inside was damaged. I will need to solder wires. Not very happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Skala

customer_reviews.title: o.k for the price
customer_reviews.text: The pros of this item is that its small, and fits well in small rooms. Its an o.k workout. As good as your more expensive ones. The Con is that its super squeeky. I wanted to be able to work out while my family and I are watching tv, but its too loud. And this happened the 2nd day of use.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Built pretty sturdy and I like the handles
customer_reviews.text: Built pretty sturdy and I like the handles. But after using for a little while, it started to squeak off and on like crazy and oiling hasn't helped much. I just put on some earphones so I won't hear the squeaks and keep going. Since it works okay but it's just a bit noisy to me it's not worth returning. I'll keep it and keep my earphones on.
customer_reviews.author: Rieko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does all that was hoped for and is exceptionally well built.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works like it says
customer_reviews.text: Works like it says. I like it because it was easy to put together. It is easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Get Steppin
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price.. watched the assembly video first..easy after that..took about 10 minutes...me 69.. 165lbs..stepper works great..no squeaks..moniter functions well..was having leg muscle problems..hopefully this strengthens my legs...balance on stepper is frim..no wobbles...would reccommend to friends
customer_reviews.author: harahansaints

customer_reviews.title: OK option for at-home cardio.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I wanted something to get a little cardio workout in at home during the winter months, and this does the trick. It's annoyingly squeaky, and not terribly sturdy. I only weigh 120 lbs, and this tilts from side to side as I step. Also, most of the component that have to be screwed on don't align perfectly, which means the handles and footrests, etc., wobble a bit as you're using them. But all in all, it's a way to get your butt moving without leaving your house, so it was worth the price for that.
customer_reviews.author: SharonTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: and while its size makes for easy storage, do not let the size of this ...
customer_reviews.text: shipment/receipt of merchandise was prompt. had been looking for something that would aid in daily maintenance of lower limb muscle tone. this item is very reasonably priced, and while its size makes for easy storage, do not let the size of this compact equipment fool you. it is a rugged, strong piece of equipment. you will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Ingenito

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the low price. Easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: After 3 days of use (1 hour per day) it started to sound like I was strangling a cat with each step. On day 9 it broke 😕.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cabrol

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed exercising on this stepper while watching T.V. or reading my Kindle. It was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Rosinbaum

customer_reviews.title: ... a realllly small house so this seemed to be perfect and it is
customer_reviews.text: I live in a realllly small house so this seemed to be perfect and it is. It's easy to put in a closet when company is coming but it is usually where I can use it every day. It has improved my ability to get up off the floor without looking like a squirrel crossing a busy street. My cousin came to visit and ordered one for herself. It reached her home before she even got there. It is steel, extremely easy to put together and, as I said, takes very little space and easily moved around.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It helps me meet my exercising goal and be able to do right at home.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Mooney

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product was missing one of the handles! Return to amazon for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Wynosia Donaby

customer_reviews.title: Will not last.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Metal connecting the pedals cracked after only 2 months of light use.
customer_reviews.author: jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Love it...I've had mine for over a year and still use it 3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong stepper
customer_reviews.text: This stepper was easy to assemble. For the price, it is quite solid and does the trick quite nicely. Interestingly, Wal-Mart sells it for $30 more!
customer_reviews.author: csp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good work out it is as if you are actually climbing stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Linzzy

customer_reviews.title: Love the Ministepper!
customer_reviews.text: I love my mini stepper!! It is perfect for toning up the legs and butt while watching TV or reading my Kindle.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Trupski

customer_reviews.title: this is awesome I can use this and doesn't take up much ...
customer_reviews.text: this is awesome I can use this and doesn't take up much space ( really ) I have returned certain items because they advertise that it doesn't take up much space or fits under your bed and they don't. this is great
customer_reviews.author: bettylou2002

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for exercising
customer_reviews.text: I owned a Wagan Mini Stepper before and loved it. Someone talked me into trying a different product and I was very sorry that I did. I received the Mini Stepper last week and so far, I love it as much as my old one. It is compact and I can get on it and step for a few minutes when I have time, or I can ride it for 1/2 hour or more.
customer_reviews.author: MamaCat

customer_reviews.title: My mini stepper
customer_reviews.text: The little stepper is durable and easy to move around from room to room easy on easy off. I do like the digital counter too
customer_reviews.author: Therese Ramos

customer_reviews.title: I wish it fit better in my spot
customer_reviews.text: I wish it fit better in my spot. The legs fit but the arms poke out a bit far and knock into my shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Barker

customer_reviews.title: It came promptly and is very sturdy. I am using it gradually as I am ...
customer_reviews.text: It came promptly and is very sturdy. I am using it gradually as I am concerned about knee problems but hope it doesn't cause problems because it is very compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This is a good mini-stair stepper
customer_reviews.text: This is a good mini-stair stepper. Easy to use in apartment. This item needs to be oiled a lot or it starts making noise (-1 star). Otherwise, very good.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: This is a great item for a small price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for such a little machine. I've already seen big changes in the waist and hips.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. It takes up less that 2 sq ft ...

customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great a little squeaky at times but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was so pleased with my stepper
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding??? I was so pleased with my stepper. I used it thirty minutes each night for a little under a month. The past week I noticed the timer and calories burned were a little off, but I just used my phone. Tonight the resistance bolt (which I have used twice) went into the machine while I was on it. I now have zero resistance and the bolt is stripped. The machine is USELESS and beyond repair. I am so disappointed. Way to ruin my nightly routine and hard work. STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mokakween

customer_reviews.title: Well built, but caused ankle pain
customer_reviews.text: Feet do not make a natural stair climbing motion, but rather bend at the ankle with every step. I'm 65, and also use a Pilates machine, and this has left me with a lot of ankle pain. I may investigate the more expensive types, before purchasing another. Maybe not a problem for someone younger, and it is really well built.
customer_reviews.author: morecats pls

customer_reviews.text: unable to use because weight, and health issues were not mention in the original ad. return shipping and restock fees weighed the cost of the item.
customer_reviews.author: linda vogel

product_meta.title: Wagan EL2273 Mini Stepper Master
product_meta.description: Step your way to fitness with the Mini Stepper Master. Turn any small area in a home or office into your personal gym with this compact stepper. 15 minutes a day on the Mini Stepper Master can help reach a healthier level of blood sugar and blood pressure. It occupies less than 1 x 1.5 - feet of floor space and provides as good a workout as the full size alternative. A digital display tracks cumulative workout time, speed, step count and calories burned. Easy assembly. Sturdy frame with steel tubing fabrication.
feature_bullets: Digital display tracks cumulative workout time, step count and calories burned
Perfect for small spaces - takes up less than 1 x 1.5 - feet floor space
Simply use for 15 minutes per day for a healthier you
Workout equals to any larger system
